page.title: 08Supernatural in Middleton
page.content: Middleton has at least four ghosts, it seems. The Cavalier Squire John Fulwood was mortally wounded by Roundheads at the rock in Bradford Dale near the wooden steps. His ghost is seen walking in the Dale. The Garden House stands between the Church and Middleton Hall. A farmer saw a lady shaking a duster from an upstairs window at 6 o'clock one morning. He commented on this only to learn that the house was locked and empty. There is no explanation. Mr Marsden used to live in part of this house and often heard footsteps on the stairs when no one was there. Several people have seen a ghost cross the road and go through the arched gateway at Roughwood Hollow. Driving by Arbor Low in the fog one night three strong white silhouettes were twice seen by Mr Rowland and his girlfriend.
